templates.template: <button name="${function_name}" states="${state}" string="${string}" type="object" icon="${icon}" class="oe_highlight"/>
<button name='%(${wizard_id})d' type='action' string='${string}' states='${state}' icon="${icon}"/>

<record id="${model_name}_tree_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${model.name}.tree</field> <field name="model">${model.name}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="${string}"> <field name="name"/> </tree> </field> </record>
<record id="${model_name}_form_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${model.name}.form</field> <field name="model">${model.name}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="${string}"> <header> <field name="state" widget="statusbar"/> </header> <sheet> <group> <group> <field name="name" /> </group> <group>
</group> </group> </sheet> <footer>
</footer> </form> </field> </record>
<record id="${model_name}_search_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${model.name}.search</field> <field name="model">${model.name}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search string="${string}"> <field name="name"/> </search> </field> </record>
<record id="${model_name}_action" model="ir.actions.act_window"> <field name="name">${string}</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field> <field name="res_model">${model.name}</field> <!-- <field name="domain">[('field_name','condition',criteria)]</field>--> <!-- <field name="context">{'flag':'value'}</field>--> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">tree,form</field> <field name="view_id" ref="${model_name}_tree_view"/> <field name="search_view_id" ref="${model_name}_search_view"/> </record>
<menuitem id="${model_name}_menu" name="${string}" sequence="${15}" parent="${cursor}" action="${model_name}_action"/>
<filter name="filter_by_${state}" string="${Done}" domain="[('${state}','=','${done}')]" />${cursor}

<record id="${model_name}_form_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${model.name}.form</field> <field name="model">${model.name}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="${form_string}"> <header> <field name="state" widget="statusbar"/> </header> <sheet> <group> <group> <field name="name" /> </group> <group>
</group> </group> </sheet> </form> </field> </record>

<record id="${model_name}_form_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${model.name}.form</field> <field name="model">${model.name}</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${view_name}"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <field name="${field_name}" position="${position}"> <field name="${new_field}"/> </field> </field> </record>
${model.name}.form ${model.name}

<record id="${model_name}_group" model="res.groups"> <field name="name">${group_name}</field> <field name="category_id" ref="${category_id_xml}"/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('${group_id_xml}'))]"/> <field name="users" eval="[(4, ref('base.user_root'))]"/> </record>

<record id="${model_name}_rule" model="ir.rule"> <field name="name">${rule_name}</field> <field name="model_id" ref="${model_id_xml}"/> <field name="groups" eval="[(4, ref('${group_id_xml}'))]"/> <field name="domain_force">[${cursor}]</field> </record>
<group name="filter_by" string="${Filter}"> <filter name="filter_by_${state}" string="${Done}" domain="[('${state}','=','${done}')]" /> ${cursor} </group>
<group name="group_by" string="${Group}"> <filter name="group_by_${state}" string="${State}" context="{'group_by': '${state}'}" /> ${cursor} </group>
<filter name="group_by_${state}" string="${State}" context="{'group_by': '${state}'}" />${cursor}
<menuitem id="${model_name}_menu" name="${MenuTitle}" sequence="${15}" parent="${cursor}" action="${model_name}_action"/>
<menuitem id="${model_name}_menu" name="${MenuTitle}" sequence="${10}" />
<notebook colspan="2"> <page string="${Page_String}"> <field name="name" /> </page> </notebook>${cursor}

<odoo> <data>
</data> </odoo>

<record id="${model_name}_search_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${model.name}.search</field> <field name="model">${model.name}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search string="${search_string}"> <field name="name"/> </search> </field> </record>

<record id="${model_name}_search_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${model.name}.search</field> <field name="model">${model.name}</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${view_name}"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <field name="${field_name}" position="${position}"> <field name="${new_field}"/> </field> </field> </record>

<record id="${model_name}_tree_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${model.name}.tree</field> <field name="model">${model.name}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="${tree_string}"> <field name="name"/> </tree> </field> </record>

<record id="${model_name}_tree_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${model.name}.tree</field> <field name="model">${model.name}</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${view_name}"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <field name="${field_name}" position="${position}"> <field name="${new_field}"/> </field> </field> </record>

<record id="${model_name}_action" model="ir.actions.act_window"> <field name="name">${Title}</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field> <field name="res_model">${model.name}</field> <!-- <field name="domain">[('field_name','condition',criteria)]</field>--> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">tree,form</field> <field name="view_id" ref="${model_name}_tree_view"/> <field name="search_view_id" ref="${model_name}_search_view"/> </record>

<record id="${model_name}_action_view_window" model="ir.actions.act_window.view"> <field name="sequence" eval="${1}"/> <field name="view_mode">${tree}</field> <field name="view_id" ref="${model_name}_${tree}_view"/> <field name="act_window_id" ref="${model_name}_action"/> </record>

<record id="${model_name}_action" model="ir.actions.act_window"> <field name="name">${Title}</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field> <field name="res_model">${model.name}</field> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">tree,form</field> <field name="view_id" ref="${model_name}_form_view"/> <field name="target">new</field> </record>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="${encoding}"?>
